name: deckd_app
description: - A tool for quickly posting info for a group, such as at an event, when you need to share info about wifi, hashtags, etc. - Content is persisted locally only, so no need for authentication. - Use [markdown](http://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/syntax) for basic formatting. - Clear content with a (reset) "trash" button. - Try it out at [deckd.co](http://deckd.co).
